amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement or enforce the requirement under section 12(c) of the United States Housing Act of 1937.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement or enforce the requirement under section 12(c) of the United States Housing Act of 1937.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 220 (Roll no. 713).
